<small>Hebrew form: **<big>[[H3664|כָּנַס]]</big>**</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כְּנַשׁ‎</span>] **verb** ==gather== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] ***id.***; Old Aramaic Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בנש‎</span> [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>298</sup>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; see also Biblical Hebrew [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כָּנַס‎</span>); — 

**Pe\`al** ***Infinitive***, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לְמִכְנַשׁ‎</span>, followed by <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ל‎</span> accusative of person [[Dan.3.2|Dan 3:2]]. **Hithpa.** ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מִתְכַּנְּשִׁין‎</span> (were) ***assembled*** [[Dan.3.3|Dan 3:3]]; [[Dan.3.27|Dan 3:27]].
